channel.title: fullstack on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in fullstack on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Partners Network
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We seek for Partners, individuals and companies likewise, to develop a co-creation system driven by mutual purposes and interests. With our average deal size at $30,000, a partner can generate at least $2,400 per project.

item.title: Typesafe Client Server
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Motivation In traditional software development, defining models and API clients is a fundamental step when using strongly-typed languages. Models: represent various data structures such as objects, request parameters, and response types.

item.title: Meet Nam Nguyen: From Frontend to DevOps - A journey of continuous growth
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: “The process of transformation and progress will never be easy, but you need it for a better version”. Life at Dwarves #5 is the career story of @nam, the Dwarves’s DevOps Engineer.
